Kansas_City.Shawnee Street Overpass: The Shawnee Street Overpass (also known as the Shawnee Road Bridge) is an overpass in Kansas City, Kansas, United States, and is located at Shawnee Road and South 7th Street Trafficway. It was completed in 1932; the engineer of the bridge is unknown. It was added to the Register of Historic Kansas Places on August 27, 1983.
